str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of echo; a throng; by implication, the rabble; by extension, a class of people; figuratively, a riot.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.
And, even, also, namely.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.
(a) I raise on high, lift up, (b) I exalt, set on high. From hupsos; to elevate.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
This; he, she, it.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
